# EnumerableUtility.Append&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a new sequence that appends the specified item.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T> Append<T>(this IEnumerable<T> seq, T item)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type of element. |
| seq | The sequence. |
| item | The item. |

## Return Value

A new sequence that appends the specified item.
